entity1.name: Social media
entity1.description: A collective term for various online platforms and tools that enable users to create, share content or participate in social networking.;;;Online platforms that allow individuals to create and share content or participate in social networking with other users.;;;A microblogging and social networking service where users post and interact with messages known as 'tweets'.;;;A photo and video sharing social networking platform owned by Facebook, Inc.;;;A social media platform that allows users to connect with friends, family, and acquaintances.;;;Online platforms that enable users to create and share content or participate in social networking.;;;A social media platform that allows users to share short messages called tweets.
entity1.chunkid: The Impact of Social Media on Communication12;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication8;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication16;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication19;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication11;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication3;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication5;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication14;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication7;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication10;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication1;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication22

entity2.name: digital age
entity2.description: The current period of history characterized by the widespread use of digital technology and communication.
entity2.chunkid: The Impact of Social Media on Communication1

entity4.name: communication
entity4.description: The exchange of information between individuals through speaking, writing, or using some other medium.
entity4.chunkid: The Impact of Social Media on Communication10;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication3

entity5.name: society
entity5.description: The aggregate of people living together in a more or less ordered community.;;;A community of people living in a particular country or region and having shared customs, laws, and organizations.
entity5.chunkid: The Impact of Social Media on Communication3;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication19

entity9.name: Snapchat
entity9.description: A multimedia messaging app that allows users to send photos and videos known as 'snaps' which disappear after being viewed.
entity9.chunkid: The Impact of Social Media on Communication5

entity11.name: citizen journalism
entity11.description: Content created by users or members of a community, often shared on social media platforms or other online forums.;;;A form of journalism where ordinary citizens play an active role in the process of collecting, reporting, analyzing, and disseminating news and information.
entity11.chunkid: The Impact of Social Media on Communication8

entity14.name: traditional media outlets
entity14.description: Established institutions responsible for the production and distribution of news and information through conventional channels such as newspapers, television, and radio.;;;Traditional forms of media such as television, radio, newspapers, and magazines that reach a broad audience.
entity14.chunkid: The Impact of Social Media on Communication12;;;The Impact of Social Media on Communication8

entity17.name: marginalized groups
entity17.description: Communities or populations that are excluded from the mainstream social, economic, and political life due to various factors such as race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, disability, etc.
entity17.chunkid: The Impact of Social Media on Communication10

entity21.name: misinformation
entity21.description: A type of misinformation consisting of deliberate falsehoods masquerading as real news stories.;;;False or inaccurate information, especially that which is deliberately intended to deceive.
entity21.chunkid: The Impact of Social Media on Communication14

entity25.name: likes, shares, and emojis
entity25.description: Common interactive elements used on social media platforms for user engagement and expression of reactions.
entity25.chunkid: The Impact of Social Media on Communication16
